name: Kong Vinter
description:
Kong Vinter, the ice-hearted tyrant, has succeeded in his plot to make winter last forever! Play as an unlikely trio on a quest to break the chilling enchantment and release the kind-hearted creatures of the north, so their warmth can thaw the snow and ice to reveal springtime.

Made for Epic's Spring Jam 2020, this game is a fairly simple puzzle platformer. If people are interested, we will look into doing something like this game when we're finished with Smugglers of Cygnus.

In the event anyone actually pitches in money to this game, it will be split 3 ways between the devs and used for coffee. But there isn't enough game here to pay for :D
